name: Space Ship E.V.E LD#46
description:
Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 46

Theme:  Keep it Alive

Ludum dare page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/space-ship-e-v-e

Space Ship E.V.E is.. a narrative adventure digital pet game? (maybe? not sure) where you control a Space Ship A.I on a (seemingly) two-year interstellar space journey. But needless to say, things don’t really go as planned.

Can you keep your ship running and your passengers alive, all while managing rogue asteroids, limited resources, computer errors, alien lifeforms and sentience itself? Keep your pets fed and try to play to the end!

Controls (Mouse)

Interact: L-click

Inspect: R-click
